name: OrionBR
description: OrionBR is a BEP-20 educational-focused token built on the BNB Smart Chain, created to promote blockchain awareness, digital literacy, and accessible learning for both new and experienced users. The project simplifies the understanding of cryptocurrencies through practical tools, tutorials, and community-driven initiatives. Inspired by the Orion constellation as a symbol of guidance and exploration, OrionBR emphasizes transparency, open participation, and knowledge-building. Its mission is to empower learners, support onboarding into Web3, and foster a safe and educational environment for understanding decentralized technologies.
